name: IntersectionUDSPlusAgricultureWorkerStatusCodesAndUDSPlusAgricultureWorkerStatusCodes
title: Intersection of UDS Plus Agriculter Worker Status Codes And UDS Plus Agriculter Worker Status Codes

concept.definition: Patients whose principal employment is in agriculture and who establish a temporary home for the purposes of such employment as a migratory agricultural worker,

Patients whose principal employment is in agriculture on a seasonal basis (e.g., picking fruit during the limited months of a picking season), but who DO NOT establish a temporary home for purposes of such employment
